simple.name: os_name
simple.description: SCA required property describing the Operating System Name

simple.name: os_version
simple.description: SCA required property describing the Operating System Version

simple.name: memTotal
simple.description: Total amount of RAM installed in the GPP

simple.name: memFree
simple.description: Amount of RAM in the GPP not in use (measured)

simple.name: memCapacity
simple.description: Amount of RAM in the GPP not allocated to an application

simple.name: memThreshold
simple.description: Percentage of total system memory this GPP can use for capacity management.

simple.name: processor_name
simple.description: SCA required property describing the CPU type

simple.name: bogomipsPerCPU
simple.description: Bogomips on an individual processor in this machine.

simple.name: bogomipsTotal
simple.description: Total CPU capacity of the GPP

simple.name: bogomipsCapacity
simple.description: Amount of CPU capacity in the GPP not allocated to an application

simple.name: bogomipsThreshold
simple.description: Percentage of total bogomips this GPP can use for capacity management.

simple.name: mcastnicTotal
simple.description: Total Multicast NIC bandwidth capacity of the GPP (assumes only 1 NIC)

simple.name: mcastnicInterface
simple.description: The Multicast NIC interface associated with this GPP (ex: eth1).

simple.name: mcastnicCapacity
simple.description: Amount of Multicast NIC capacity in the GPP not allocated to an application

simple.name: mcastnicHasVLAN
simple.description: Check whether Multicast NIC has access to a particular VLAN

simple.name: mcastnicThreshold
simple.description: Percentage of total Multicast NIC this GPP can use for capacity management.

simple.name: diskTotal
simple.description: Total disk capacity of /data on the GPP

simple.name: diskFree
simple.description: Unconsumed disk capacity of /data on the GPP (measured)

simple.name: diskCapacity
simple.description: Amount of disk capacity in the GPP not allocated to an application

simple.name: diskThreshold
simple.description: Percentage of total disk this GPP can use for capacity management.

simple.name: diskrateCapacity
simple.description: Amount of disk rate available to applications

simple.name: diskHasMountPoint
simple.description: Mount point dependency. Query is of the form - server:mount_point

simple.name: hostName
simple.description: Host name on which the device is deployed

simple.name: DeviceKind
simple.description: The type of this device

simple.name: command_line
simple.description: Command to run on the command line

simple.name: command_output
simple.description: Command to run on the command line

simple.name: command_status
simple.description: Return value for command to run on the command line
